document_data.name: Mahatnartorian
document_data.mainbody: '''Mahatnartorian''', called the '''Master of the Mountains''', was a [[red dragon|red]] [[great wyrm]]{{Cite web enhancement/Roll Call of Dragons|10}} during the [[Time of Dragons]]. He was killed by [[Durothil (prince)|Prince Durothil]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' {{Yearlink|-25100}}, Durothil was planning to let his tame [[silver dragon]] [[Silverywing]] free from magical confinement, and sent [[Sharlario Moonflower]] to the top of a mountain in preparation. But Mahatnartorian appeared and attacked Sharlario. Silverywing emerged from the magical pocket dimension, ridden by Durothil, and attacked Mahatnartorian, but she was not powerful enough to defeat him. The fight was over quickly and resulted in the deaths of Silverywing, Mahatnartorian and Durothil himself. [[Ghaunadaur]] had his sacrifice.
